availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George P. Jouett (Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and lieutenant colonel in 15th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) )

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Margaret H. Jouett. Attorney in Fayette County in 1850. Served in the 15th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as lieutenant colonel from December 14, 1861, to October 8, 1862. Died at the Battle of Perryville in Chaplin Hills, Kentucky, on October 8, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 209B.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 892.
Find A Grave, "George P. Jouett (1813-1862)," Memorial #35088041, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35088041 (accessed November 17, 2020).
